name: Ari Art Emerald
description: Ari Art Emerald Glow shines like a precious gem with every step. Golden embroidery and ruby accents embrace the emerald green hue, while its regal silhouette and refined details turn this gown into a masterpiece that leaves an unforgettable impression. Features handcrafted corset, intricate golden embroidery, and ruby accents. Couture silhouette design.

name: Royal Lilac Aura
description: A couture gown in soft lilac tones, featuring a sculpted silhouette adorned with intricate crystal detailing and bold, cascading ruffle sleeves that create a regal and unforgettable presence. Hand-embellished crystal embroidery with dramatic lilac ruffled sleeves.

name: Snow
description: A white couture gown with floral embroidery, a fitted silhouette, and elegant transparency for a luxurious look. Designed for gala nights and red carpet moments with intricate white embellishments. The gown is see-through but will include lining, with options for different lining types and customization to match skin tone.

name: Verdant Grace
description: A sophisticated nude dress enhanced by a grand green cape that adds movement, depth, and couture presence. The dress is see-through with lining options available. Customization available including alterations, color changes, and tailored measurements.

name: Cora
description: Mint beaded fabric embellished with shiny leafs and rhinestones. Mermaid silhouette. Deep V line.

name: Daphne
description: Emerald green velvet adorned with off-white lace and green rhinestone embellishments. Featuring an irregular cut-out, shoulder pads with hanging silver tassels, and a daring high side slit for a bold, sophisticated look.

name: Linus
description: A luxurious black velvet dress with a deep V-neckline, ruched detailing on the hips, and a daring high side slit. The richly embellished corset features an off-shoulder design adorned with elegant black tassels, exuding glamour and sophistication.

name: Ophelia
description: Navy blue velvet with gray lace embellished with silver rhinestones and hanging silver tassels. Middle cut-out in belly and bust. Mermaid silhouette.

name: Pandora
description: Champagne velvet dress with richly embellished corset, featuring middle cut-out in belly and bust, draped on the hips for a more curved appearance. Mermaid silhouette.

name: Kassia
description: Black satin dress with a deep V-neckline and a sleek mermaid silhouette. Featuring satin sleeves, a daring high side slit, and sparkling silver tassels adorned with rhinestones for a glamorous finish.

name: Mira
description: The Mira gown from the Lunar Reverie Collection is a striking blend of elegance and allure. Designed in a rich green hue, this gown features delicate hanging tassels that add movement and texture. Key features include hanging tassels, long sleeves, mermaid silhouette, and embellishment with green stones.

name: Aloa
description: Embellished with white and gold pearls, high slit, corset shape. A stunning fusion of opulence and elegance with a figure-flattering corset shape. The daring high slit adds a modern edge to the design.

name: Crystal Bloom
description: A handcrafted gown adorned with sparkling stones and 3D flowers, blending elegance and delicate beauty in every detail. Stone-studded design with 3D floral beauty.

name: Nathalie
description: Hanging tassels short sleeves, mermaid silhouette, beading details. A breathtaking blend of glamour and sophistication featuring intricate beadwork, deep illusion neckline, and figure-hugging silhouette. See-through design with lining options available.

name: Anais
description: Bold, sculptural, and seductively elegant — a form-fitting mermaid gown crafted with sheer illusion fabric and dramatic bead embroidery. Features a deep sweetheart neckline, hand-beaded pearl and sequin embellishments, long fitted illusion sleeves, and a fishtail hem.
